title: ISimpleFilletFeatureData2.IGetFeatures
description: Gets the features on which to create a simple radius fillet.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of features of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
ISimpleFilletFeatureData2::GetFeatureCount
before calling this method to get the value for Count.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
